name: Dark Necrotic & wiinus's Kuro Mod
description: Improves screen real estate for your favorite site's dark theme.  Tweaked and updated to work with collages and other options.  (BTW: both images are of the mod)
additional_info:
This a collaborative effort based on !user's http://userstyles.org/styles/13597/what-cd-kuro-mod
Much thanks to DarkNecrotic for the slew of improvements!
